titleInfo.title: The ETACE Virtual Appliance: An Exploratory for the Eurace@Unibi model

name.namePart: 20th International Conference on Computing in Economics and Finance

mods.abstract: This paper presents the ETACE Virtual Appliance. The purpose of the software package is, among others, to provide researchers the possibility to explore the dynamics of the Eurace@Unibi agent-based macroeconomic model and to encourage the reproducibility and transparency of research. The package contains various components that allow the user to initialize, simulate and analyze the model. We also give a short overview of what can be done with the ETACE Virtual Appliance.
